item.description:
A casual get together for drinks, dinner and fun times. Meet new, interesting and friendly people who live/work in the Metro West area. Event is free, just pay for your own drink/food.

The Aegean is known for its great seafood and Greek/Mediterranean food, and terrific atmosphere. This is a popular place! We will meet in the bar area, then will be in the dining room for dinner.

Joint event with the Social Fun meet up group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). Please call 774 232 0000 if you can't find us.
item.why: Join us for drinks, some food and fun times. The Aegean has a great atmosphere, good drinks and really good food! Relax and get to know some new, fun, friendly people.
item.name: Meet up for drinks , dinner and good times at Aegean Restaurant
